Package org.springdata.cassandra.repository

Interface Summary
CassandraRepository<T,ID extends Serializable> Cassandra-specific extension of the CrudRepository interface.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Async Annotation to define asynchronous queries.
Nonstop Annotation to define nonstop queries.
Query Annotation to declare finder queries directly on repository methods.
QueryOptions Annotation to declare query options for methods.
QueryTracing Annotation to be used for define StatementOptions QueryTracing parameter.
TimeoutMilliseconds Annotation to be used for define Timeout parameter in milliseconds for Nonstop operations.
TimestampMilliseconds Annotation to be used for define Timestamp parameter for save and delete operations.
TimeToLiveSeconds Annotation to be used for define Ttl parameter for save operations.
